Pimpinan KPK ke Anies: Jangan Tinggalkan e-Budgeting dan Kembali ke Manual
02 Nov 2019, 14:28 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Wakil Ketua KPK Laode M Syarif merespons soal polemik sistem anggaran digital milik Pemprov DKI Jakarta yang dinilai Gubernur Anies Baswedan tidak smart. Syarif justru menilai sistem anggaran Pemprov DKI adalah yang terbaik di Indonesia.
"Kita PATUT BERSYUKUR, gara-gara adanya e-planning/e-budgeting @DKIJakarta, anggaran-anggaran aneh dapat dipantau masyarakat, sehingga tidak jadi masuk dalam APBD. @KPK_RI sering mencontohkan e-budgeting @DKIJakarta dan Kota Surabaya sebagai e-budgeting terbaik di Indonesia," kata Syarif melalui Twitter-nya, @LaodeMSyarif, seperti dilihat detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Syarif mengatakan sistem anggaran digital atau e-budgeting merupakan salah satu alat pencegahan korupsi. Dia mempersilakan Anies meningkatkan kualitas sistem e-budgeting Pemprov DKI, tapi jangan menghapusnya.
"Jika @DKIJakarta dan pak @aniesbaswedan berniat untuk MENINGKATKAN KUALITAS e-budgeting yang sekarang agar LEBIH SMART, SILAHKAN. Tapi jangan meninggalkan e-budgeting dan kembali ke cara manual. @KPK_RI," tulis Syarif.
Diberitakan sebelumnya, Anies menilai masalah penganggaran Pemprov DKI sudah terjadi selama bertahun-tahun dan pangkalnya adalah di sistem. Dia merasa mendapat 'warisan'.
"Ini problem muncul tiap tahun. Maka yang kita koreksi adalah sistemnya. Sistem masih manual, pengecekan manual, maka ada puluhan ribu item. Saya kerjakan satu-satu kemarin. Tapi saya tidak berpanggung," ucap Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jalan Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Rabu (30/10).

KPK Leaders to Anies: Don't Leave e-Budgeting and Return to the Manual
02 Nov 2019, 14:28 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Deputy Chairman of the KPK Laode M Syarif responded to the polemic about the digital budget system of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government which was assessed by Governor Anies Baswedan as not smart. Syarif actually assessed that the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's budget system is the best in Indonesia.
"We should be grateful, because of the e-planning / e-budgeting of @DKIJakarta, strange budgets can be monitored by the public, so they do not enter the APBD. @KPK_RI often exemplifies e-budgeting @DKIJakarta and Surabaya as e-budgeting. best in Indonesia, "said Syarif through his Twitter, @LaodeMSyarif, as seen by AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Syarif said the digital budgeting system or e-budgeting was one of the tools to prevent corruption. He invited Anies to improve the quality of the Jakarta Provincial Government's e-budgeting system, but don't delete it.
"If @DKIJakarta and Pak @aniesbaswedan intend to IMPROVE the current QUALITY of e-budgeting to be MORE SMART, PLEASE. But don't leave e-budgeting and return to the manual method. @KPK_RI," Syarif wrote.
Reported earlier, Anies assessed that the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's budgeting problem had occurred for years and the base was in the system. He felt he had inherited.
"This problem appears every year. So what we corrected is the system. The system is still manual, manual checking, then there are tens of thousands of items. I did it one by one yesterday. But I am not on stage," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Jalan Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Wednesday (10/30).
